abstracts.cdata!:
The Public Enterprise Sector Adjustment
            Program Project supports the extension of the
            Government's structural adjustment program aimed at
            deepening the reforms in the public enterprise sector.
            Actions under the program include: (a) modification of the
            legal and institutional framework with the objective of
            eliminating state monopolies and facilitating increased
            private sector participation; (b) a program of divestiture
            aimed at reducing the number of enterprises in the sector;
            and (c) financial restructuring programs for key enterprises
            remaining in the sector, particularly Societe Nationale
            Industrielle et Miniere (SNIM), the iron ore mining company,
            which is by far the largest enterprise in the country.
